title: Software-Utilized Education for Scientific Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer and smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Intensive learning of contextually appropriate software tool utilization for solving science-related practical tasks

learning_goals: Ability to design data analysis processes using spreadsheet tools for solving real-world scientific problems
Simulation software can be used to visually represent and interpret complex scientific phenomena
Collaborative tools enable sharing project outcomes with peer learners and incorporating feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
